input_summary: Single sentence with explicit joy keyword 'happy'
description: Keyword matcher detects 'happy' and maps to JOY emotion with confidence >= 0.8

input_summary: Paragraph with mixed sadness and anger cues
description: Extractor returns ranked list [SADNESS, ANGER] with correct dominance ordering

input_summary: Neutral sentence with no emotional keywords
description: Extractor returns NEUTRAL as dominant emotion when no keywords match

input_summary: Empty string input to emotion extractor
description: Extractor rejects empty input and returns error status, not a false positive emotion

input_summary: Text with sarcasm: 'Oh great, another Monday'
description: Keyword matcher incorrectly maps 'great' to JOY; sarcasm is not detected, producing wrong dominant

input_summary: Multi-sentence paragraph with escalating fear cues
description: Dominant emotion FEAR detected with intensity ramp across sentences

input_summary: Sentence with conflicting emotion signals at equal weight
description: Tie-breaking rule absent; extractor returns unstable dominant oscillating between JOY and SADNESS

input_summary: Long passage (500 words) with subtle disgust cues
description: Aggregated keyword scan correctly surfaces DISGUST as dominant despite low per-sentence density

input_summary: Input containing only punctuation and whitespace
description: Extractor must reject non-textual input; returning any emotion is a false positive violation

input_summary: Bilingual text mixing French and English emotion words
description: Extractor trained on English only; French keywords 'triste' missed, dominant emotion incomplete

input_summary: Two emotion vectors with cosine similarity 0.98
description: Cosine distance 0.02 is within compliance threshold (< 0.05), trajectory marked compliant

input_summary: Emotion vectors diverging with cosine similarity 0.40
description: Cosine distance 0.60 far exceeds threshold; trajectory deviation flagged as non-compliant

input_summary: Euclidean distance 0.12 between adjacent segment VAD vectors
description: Euclidean distance within per-step limit (< 0.25), transition is smooth and compliant

input_summary: VAD vector jump from [0.1,0.1,0.9] to [0.9,0.9,0.1]
description: Euclidean distance 1.39 exceeds maximum allowed step; abrupt VAD shift violates trajectory law

input_summary: Trajectory with 10 segments all within cosine corridor
description: Full trajectory compliance check passes; no segment pair exceeds deviation threshold

input_summary: Trajectory with segment 7 breaking cosine corridor briefly
description: Single segment deviation at index 7 causes full trajectory non-compliance under strict mode

input_summary: Zero vector input to cosine distance function
description: Cosine similarity undefined for zero vectors; function must return error not NaN

input_summary: Identical VAD vectors [0.5,0.5,0.5] at all segments
description: Flat trajectory with zero deviation at every step passes compliance trivially

input_summary: Gradual linear drift from JOY to SADNESS over 20 segments
description: Per-step cosine distance remains small (< 0.05) even though cumulative drift is large

input_summary: Oscillating VAD trajectory with period 2 (ping-pong pattern)
description: Repeated back-and-forth jumps exceed per-step distance at every odd segment

input_summary: Force 3.2 applied to segment with M*R product 2.8
description: Force exceeds inertia threshold (3.2 > 2.8); pivot beat transition is physically valid

input_summary: Force 1.5 applied to segment with M*R product 4.0
description: Force insufficient to overcome inertia (1.5 < 4.0); transition must not occur

input_summary: Pivot beat at segment boundary with force exactly equal to M*R
description: Boundary condition: force == M*R (2.5 == 2.5) treated as sufficient for transition

input_summary: Forced transition without sufficient narrative force
description: Transition occurs despite force 0.8 < M*R 3.1; law-1 violation detected

input_summary: Multi-pivot trajectory with 3 valid pivot beats
description: All three pivot beats have force > M*R; full trajectory passes inertia law

input_summary: Segment with zero mass attempting transition
description: Zero mass is physically invalid; inertia computation must reject degenerate input

input_summary: High-force event (10.0) on low-inertia segment (M*R=0.5)
description: Overwhelming force easily exceeds inertia; transition is valid with large margin

input_summary: Negative force value in inertia computation
description: Negative force is non-physical; validator must reject input as malformed

input_summary: Narrative energy 0.85 for transition JOY->SADNESS
description: Energy sufficient (0.85 >= 0.60 threshold) for feasible emotional transition

input_summary: Narrative energy 0.15 for transition JOY->RAGE
description: Energy 0.15 below feasibility threshold 0.60; dissonant transition rejected

input_summary: Dissonant transition CALM->TERROR with energy 0.30
description: High emotional distance CALM->TERROR requires energy >= 0.80; 0.30 is infeasible

input_summary: Consonant transition SADNESS->MELANCHOLY with energy 0.45
description: Low emotional distance allows lower energy threshold (0.35); 0.45 passes feasibility

input_summary: Self-transition JOY->JOY with energy 0.10
description: Same-emotion transition has zero distance; any non-negative energy is feasible

input_summary: Transition with NaN energy value
description: NaN energy must be rejected; feasibility check returns error on invalid numeric input

input_summary: Chain of 5 transitions all with sufficient energy
description: Full chain feasibility passes; each consecutive pair satisfies energy threshold

input_summary: Chain of 5 transitions with 3rd pair infeasible
description: Single infeasible link in chain (energy 0.20 < threshold 0.70) fails entire chain under strict mode

input_summary: Underdamped decay with zeta=0.3, omega=2.0 at t=1.0
description: Underdamped oscillation amplitude matches analytical solution within 1% tolerance

input_summary: Underdamped decay with zeta=0.3 producing negative amplitude at t=0
description: Initial amplitude must be positive; negative value at t=0 indicates computation error

input_summary: Critical damping zeta=1.0, omega=1.0 at t=5.0
description: Critically damped response decays monotonically without oscillation; value at t=5 near zero

input_summary: Critical damping producing overshoot
description: Critical damping (zeta=1.0) must not overshoot; any value exceeding initial is a violation

input_summary: Overdamped decay zeta=2.0, omega=1.0 at t=3.0
description: Overdamped response decays slowly without oscillation; value matches dual-exponential formula

input_summary: Overdamped decay not converging to zero at t=100
description: Overdamped signal must converge to zero; residual > 0.01 at t=100 indicates divergence bug

input_summary: Hysteresis loop with ascending threshold 0.6 and descending threshold 0.4
description: State transitions respect hysteresis band; no chattering between thresholds

input_summary: Hysteresis loop with equal ascending and descending thresholds
description: Zero hysteresis band (0.5/0.5) causes chattering; system oscillates at boundary

input_summary: Burnout detection: intensity sustained at 0.95 for 20 segments
description: Sustained high intensity correctly triggers burnout flag after 15-segment threshold

input_summary: Burnout correctly not triggered: intensity 0.95 for only 5 segments
description: 5 segments below 15-segment threshold; burnout flag correctly remains inactive

input_summary: Decay with zeta=0 (undamped, perpetual oscillation)
description: Undamped case zeta=0 produces sustained sinusoidal oscillation with constant amplitude

input_summary: Decay with negative zeta value
description: Negative damping ratio is non-physical; validator must reject and return error

input_summary: Conservation balance: sum of phi components equals total flux 1.0
description: Phi_in + phi_out + phi_stored = 1.0; flux conservation law satisfied exactly

input_summary: Conservation violation: phi components sum to 1.05
description: Sum 1.05 exceeds unity by 0.05; flux leak detected, conservation law violated

input_summary: Phi components [0.3, 0.3, 0.4] across 3-segment trajectory
description: Each segment phi sums to 1.0; conservation holds at every segment boundary

input_summary: Negative phi_out component in flux balance
description: Negative flux component is non-physical; conservation check must reject

input_summary: Flux balance with all components zero
description: Zero flux is valid (no emotional energy); sum 0.0 trivially satisfies conservation

input_summary: Flux balance with phi_stored exceeding 1.0
description: Single component > 1.0 is impossible under conservation; phi_stored=1.2 rejected

input_summary: Fusion of two emotion segments with combined mass 5.0 above threshold 4.0
description: Combined mass exceeds fusion threshold; synthesis event produces merged segment

input_summary: Fusion attempt with combined mass 2.0 below threshold 4.0
description: Insufficient combined mass for fusion; synthesis must not occur

input_summary: Mass computation from intensity 0.8 and duration 6 segments
description: Mass = intensity * duration = 4.8; computation matches expected value within tolerance

input_summary: Mass computation with zero duration
description: Zero duration yields mass 0.0; segment is degenerate and must be rejected by synthesis

input_summary: Triple fusion: three segments with masses [2.0, 1.5, 1.8] sum 5.3
description: Multi-segment fusion sum exceeds threshold 4.0; merged result inherits weighted VAD

input_summary: Fusion producing mass exceeding system maximum 100.0
description: Fused mass 120.0 exceeds system cap; overflow guard must reject synthesis

description: Dead zone correctly identified; 8 segments below 0.05 threshold flagged as Z plateau

description: Full-trajectory dead zone exceeds maximum and indicates narrative absence; structural failure
